org.apache.fop.util
Interface XMLizable

All Superinterfaces:
org.apache.xmlgraphics.util.XMLizable
All Known Implementing Classes:
XMPMetadata
Deprecated. Use the interface in Apache XML Graphics Commons instead.

public interface XMLizable
extends org.apache.xmlgraphics.util.XMLizable

This interface can be implemented by classes willing to provide an XML representation of their current state as SAX events.

Methods inherited from interface org.apache.xmlgraphics.util.XMLizable
